    • Constructor Detail

      • GameState

        public GameState(int level)
        Constructor of the class. Initializes the ogres ArrayList. By default, victory has not been achieved, it isn't game-over and it isn't a test level.
        Parameters:
        level - The number of the level to which the game will be initiated.

      • setLevel_no

        public void setLevel_no(int level)
        Sets the level of the gamestate as well as it's current map by copying it from the Map class. It also changes the position of the Hero/Guard to the default position of the corresponding level.
        Parameters:
        level - The number of the level.

      • test_collision

        public boolean test_collision(java.lang.String enemy)
        Checks if the hero collides with an enemy.
        Parameters:
        enemy - The string representing the enemy character to test the collision with. .
        Returns:
        True if the coordinates of the hero and the enemy are adjacent.
